docs.title: 2024 Workshop on Frontiers of Chemical Physics
docs.text: Welcome to 2024 Workshop on Frontiers of Chemical Physics! Our workshop will take place Aug 24—26, 2024, in University of Science and Technology of China (USTC), Hefei, Anhui, China. The workshop aims to foster the exchange of cutting-edge research in various fields of chemical physics, encompassing both experimental and theoretical advancements.

docs.title: Venue & Accommodation
docs.text: • 合肥施柏阁大观酒店(STEIGENBERGER ICONS HEFEI), No.1 Hengshan Road Lakeside New Area Hefei China

Hotel
docs.text: Accommodation for participants will be arranged at Gaosu New Century (Gao Su Kai Yuan) International Hotel.

docs.title: AIRPORT or RAILWAY STATION PICKUP
docs.text: Picking up from the Hefei airport or railway station is available if necessary traveling information was sent to the organizers on time.
